莫迪总理：瑜伽超越地狱，超越信仰，超越一切 Yoga is above region, above faith, above everything: PM Modi莫迪总理：瑜伽超越地域，超越信仰，超越一切 http://i.santaihu.com/india/2019-06-21/a7fe3dce5ad17cf8622c6e91145d851a.jpgRANCHI: Appealing to people to take yoga to all sections of society, Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday said yoga is above everything, as he performed various asanas with around 40,000 enthusiasts at the Prabhat Tara ground here to mark the fifth International Day of Yoga.兰契:周五，莫迪总理在普拉巴特塔拉广场与大约4万名瑜伽爱好者一起表演各种瑜伽体式，呼吁人们将瑜伽推广到社会的各个阶层。莫迪称，瑜伽超越一切。Modi also urged people to make yoga an integral part of life.莫迪还敦促人们将瑜伽融入生活。"We should make efforts to take yoga from cities to villages and tribal areas. Yoga is above religion, caste, colour, gender and region, it is above everything," he told the gathering.莫迪呼吁大家：“我们应该努力把瑜伽从城市带到乡村。瑜伽超越了宗教、种姓、肤色、性别和地域，超越了一切。”The main event for the yoga day was held at the Jharkhand capital.瑜伽日的主要活动在贾坎德邦首府举行。"It (yoga) is constant and evolving for centuries. The essence of yoga has been stable and remained the same -- healthy body, stable mind, spirit of oneness. Yoga has provided a perfect blend of knowledge, karma and bhakti," the prime minister said. Events to mark the day are being held across the globe and in India, several of them are being led by Union ministers, including Amit Shah and Rajnath Singh.莫迪称：“几个世纪以来，瑜伽一直在不断发展。瑜伽的本质是稳定不变——健康的身体，平稳的心境，心神合一。”世界各地和印度都在举行纪念瑜伽日的活动，其中一些活动由联邦部长领导，包括阿米特·沙阿和拉杰纳特·辛格。http://i.santaihu.com/india/2019-06-21/5b2f204ba251b9c40fb456bcab5528bb.jpgExpressing concern that young people are becoming vulnerable to heart ailments, Modi said, "Yoga can play a huge role in tackling the issue and hence, this year's theme is 'Yoga for Heart'."莫迪表达了对年轻人易患心脏病的担忧，他说:“瑜伽可以在解决这个问题上发挥巨大作用，因此，今年的主题是‘瑜伽与心脏健康’。”"It is painful to read about alcoholism, substance abuse, diabetes and other things, adding yoga offers a solution to these problems," he added.莫迪称:“看到酗酒、药物滥用、糖尿病和其他疾病的报道令人难过，而瑜伽为这些问题提供了一个解决方案。”http://i.santaihu.com/india/2019-06-21/4034e4ab7e0456a35c5694fff0b1a41c.jpgThe International Day of Yoga is being celebrated annually on June 21 since 2015.自2015年以来，国际瑜伽日定为每年的6月21日。印度时报读者的评论：译文来源：三泰虎 http://www.santaihu.com/47877.html外文：https://timesofindia.indiatimes.comsatya murthy• 6 hours agofor popularising Yoga globally, Modiji deserves credit for this noble cause.在全球范围内普及瑜伽，莫迪为这一崇高事业所做的努力值得赞扬。
